name: Drive around on my random island...
name_original: Drive around on my random island...
description:
Drive around on my random island...

CONTROLS:
WASD = move
move mouse = look around

This is an island generator that can generate random islands (based on https://grelf.itch.io/forest 's terrain generation algorithm). Every time you reload the webpage a new island gets gerenated.

Try it out and drive around a bit and have a NICE TIME!

It's part of a coming game. Follow my development on: https://twitter.com/kbrecordzz

kbrecordzz
